## FadingFeatureParameters interface

Parameters used when constructing a new implementor of \[\[FadingFeature\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FadingFeatureParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fadeFar](./harp-materials.fadingfeatureparameters.fadefar.md) | number | Distance to the camera (range: <code>[0.0, 1.0]</code>) from which the objects are transparent. |
|  [fadeNear](./harp-materials.fadingfeatureparameters.fadenear.md) | number | Distance to the camera (range: <code>[0.0, 1.0]</code>) from which the objects start fading out. |
